imdb.title: Seikuriddo sebun
imdb.plot: Alma Tandouji lives a lonely and solitary life in a certain port city within the Kantou region. One day, he is approached by Aiba Ruri who asks for his help, for the power of the Sacred Seven which resides within Alma.

episodes.title: Awakening of the Stone
episodes.plot: Tandouji Aruma, a 17 year old student who prefers to live away from others due to an incident in the past, is contacted by the mysterious Aiba Ruri to use the power of the Sacred Seven inside him to defeat a monster called 'Ashi'.

episodes.title: A Bond in the Color of Ruri
episodes.plot: Even after using the power of the Sacred Seven to defeat the Medusa Ashi, Aruma still has doubts about whether that power can be used for good. Even though Ruri explains to him how the Sacred Seven came to be, Aruma is not convinced he can help until he learns the true reason for Ruri's fight against the Ashi. Using this conviction, Aruma sets out to fight a new Ashi that has appeared as a massive typhoon off the coast of Japan, but he never thought that he would have to learn to skydive.

episodes.title: The Crazy Knight
episodes.plot: Ruri returns from London after buying a fine grade gemstone for Alma. During a routine trip home, her convoy is attacked by Knight, the one who caused the Darkstone incidents. Kenmi reveals his reasons of his research on the Sacred Seven.

episodes.title: School Fair of Hell
episodes.plot: Ruri and Alma participate for the school fair. However, things turn worse when a few of Knight's Darkstone snakes cause problems. Wakana converses with Ruri to know her a little more.

episodes.title: The Heart's Mirror
episodes.plot: Tandoji and the Geology Club went to a camp. There, Kagami and Tandoji found a dark stone and informed Ruri about it. They managed to defeat it without the geology club members knowing.

episodes.title: One More Night
episodes.plot: Ruri invites Alma to eat lunch with her. Alma feels very annoyed by Ruri. Knight kidnapped Ruri to get a serum that will help him control the dark stone in him.

episodes.title: The True Lightstone and Darkstone
episodes.plot: Alma and Ruri hears the dark truth of Kenmi's so called research from Knight.

episodes.title: Show Me Your Devotion
episodes.plot: Confused as to whose side tells the truth, Ruri and Alma reflects on how they've become ignorant with what's really happening.

episodes.title: A Will Like a Rolling Stone
episodes.plot: Alma is made fun of by her classmates at school. But it was also evidence that the prejudice against Alma had disappeared and the students around him had begun to accept him, and, Alma was beginning to establish a place in the school.

episodes.title: Aoi's Memory
episodes.plot: At Aiba's house, there was a change in Aoi who had been asleep for five years. According to Onigawara, the strong Sacred Seven power that Alma showed in the battle the other day resonated with Aoi and evoked change.

episodes.title: Blade Sharpened
episodes.plot: Ruri was taken in to custody by Kenmi. Alma, Kagami and the entire Aiba Foundation declared war against Kenmi Group and rescued Ruri. Knight and Fei plans to use the vaccine on Zero to retain his mind and control over his Darkstone powers.

episodes.title: Sacred Seven
episodes.plot: Kenmi's laughter, which absorbed the energy of Fay's older brother No. 0 and powered up the artigem suit, echoed in the foothills of Fuji.
